name: Yar Muhammad
tagline: I build cross-platform mobile apps and intelligent automation workflows.

bullets: Developed and maintained cross-platform mobile apps for healthcare, eCommerce, and productivity.
Integrated GPT-4 and VAPI.AI to build intelligent voice assistants for real-time call handling.
Built automation workflows using n8n and Make (Integromat) for CRM/API integrations.
Implemented image processing automation using Python.

education.institution: FG Quaid e Azam Degree College Chaklala Rawalpindi

projects.title: EyeScan App
projects.summary: Image capture app with watermark/logo overlay, sharing, and email functionality.
projects.description: A comprehensive image capture application designed for healthcare imaging solutions with advanced watermark and logo overlay capabilities.
features: Real-time image capture with camera integration
Dynamic watermark and logo overlay system
Email functionality for instant sharing
Image processing with Python Pillow library
Healthcare-compliant image handling
projects.challenges: Implementing real-time image processing while maintaining app performance.
projects.solution: Optimized image processing pipeline using Python backend services.

projects.title: VAPI Voice Assistant
projects.summary: Voice assistant for smart scheduling using GPT-4 + VAPI.AI.
projects.description: An intelligent voice assistant system that leverages GPT-4 and VAPI.AI for natural language processing and smart scheduling capabilities.
features: Natural language processing with GPT-4
Real-time voice interaction via VAPI.AI
Smart scheduling and appointment management
Context-aware conversation handling
Integration with calendar systems
projects.challenges: Creating seamless voice interactions with minimal latency.
projects.solution: Implemented efficient API caching and optimized voice processing pipeline.

projects.title: React Native Calculator
projects.summary: Advanced mobile calculator app with scientific functions and theme support.
projects.description: A feature-rich calculator application built with React Native featuring basic and scientific calculations, dark/light theme toggle, and clean modern UI design.
features: Basic arithmetic operations with precision handling
Modern circular button design with intuitive layout
Dark and light theme support with smooth transitions
Responsive design optimized for mobile devices
Clean and minimal user interface
Real-time calculation display with proper formatting
projects.challenges: Creating an intuitive calculator interface with proper mathematical precision and theme switching.
projects.solution: Implemented clean component architecture with React Native and integrated theme management system.

projects.title: Multi-Agent n8n Workflows
projects.summary: Complex automation workflows using multiple AI agents for business process optimization.
projects.description: Sophisticated multi-agent workflow system built with n8n that orchestrates multiple AI agents to handle complex business automation tasks.
features: Multi-agent coordination and communication
Dynamic workflow routing based on context
Integration with multiple APIs and services
Real-time monitoring and error handling
Custom node development for specialized tasks
Scalable agent deployment architecture
projects.challenges: Coordinating multiple agents and managing complex workflow dependencies.
projects.solution: Developed custom orchestration layer with state management and agent communication protocols.

projects.title: Les Femmes Fashion App
projects.summary: E-commerce fashion marketplace with advanced search and categorization features.
projects.description: A sophisticated fashion marketplace mobile application featuring product browsing, search functionality, and category-based shopping experience with modern UI design.
features: Advanced product search with filter options
Category-based browsing (Womens, Kids, Clothing, Bags, Shoes)
Buy & sell preloved fashion items marketplace
Modern carousel-style product displays
Promotional banners and special deals integration
Clean navigation with shopping cart functionality
projects.challenges: Creating an intuitive shopping experience with complex product categorization and search functionality.
projects.solution: Implemented modular component architecture with advanced filtering system and responsive carousel displays.

projects.title: Tutors-Students Platform
projects.summary: Educational platform connecting tutors with students for personalized learning.
projects.description: A comprehensive educational platform that connects qualified tutors with students, featuring user registration, profile management, and tuition matching system.
features: Dual user registration system (Students & Tutors)
Comprehensive profile creation with location services
Available tuitions listing with filtering by class level
Tuition details with location, subject, and tutor type
Multi-step form with dropdowns for educational requirements
Authentication system with secure login/registration
projects.challenges: Creating a seamless matching system between tutors and students with complex form handling.
projects.solution: Developed comprehensive user flow with role-based registration and intelligent tuition matching algorithms.
